channel.title: How to make a shop sell things for item. Not cash!
channel.description: I want to make shop accept a certain item and not cash or points. I looked all over Google and couldn't find anything. Please help?

item.title: How to make a shop sell things for item. Not cash!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Doing Cho2:

Anyone got a solution please? If you know of a tut, please gimme link? really need this.

I’ve told you more than once what to do, Google can give you a link to a tutorial if you search, and you aren’t giving us any feedback on errors or even code. You’re basically saying, “I can’t do this, do it for me”
Which in all honesty, isn’t a way to learn. If you want help, you need to help us help you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop sell things for item. Not cash!

item.title: How to make a shop sell things for item. Not cash!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Doing Cho2, post:8, topic:530804”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=649566.msg4364522#msg4364522 date=1379387951]

The thing is, idk if I even put the code correctly.

So the post the code you added/edited along with the errors.
[/quote]
I added a new code, and the shop is saying the value of the item is 10 (this). But when i try to buy it, it wont sell it to me. And yes, i do have the item to buy the thing in the shop.[/quote]
Add an exception to your buy item method for that shop only, and make it check for the specified item, and if you have enough, it deletes, if not it says you need X amount to buy Y item.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop sell things for item. Not cash!
